name: Denakop Plugin
author: Denakop

sections.description:
Our innovation relies in the simplicity, developing solutions to facilitate our partners operation .

This plugin represents more than a simple implementation tool, but it saves your team time by offering an uncomplicated DIY (Do it Yourself) model, and agility, making room to monetize your audience quickly.

Just download our plugin, insert your Account ID and, automatically, our TAG will be positioned directly in your website’s HTML, ready to be activated in our panel

Welcome to Denakop!
Programmatic as it Should be
sections.installation:
The plugin installation can be done by accessing the menu “Plugins > Add new\” and searching for \”Denakop\” or by following the steps below:

  1. Download the plugin at: https://wordpress.org/plugins/denakop/
  2. Send the ZIP file by accessing the panel \”Plugins > Add new > Send plugin\”
  3. Activate the plugin
sections.faq:
1. Where can I find my account ID?
    A: Contact your account manager, he will forward your ID.

  2. The AMP tag is not being inserted, what should I do?
    A: Our plugin works based on the \”amp_is_request\” function, check if the plugin that enables the AMP on your website uses this function.
sections.changelog:
2021.02.11 – version 1.0.2
* Condition that ckeck if AMP plugin is enabled to add the Denakop AMP tag on header and body

2021.02.10 – version 1.0.1
* Add amp_is_request hook to add the elements only on AMP request

2021.02.02 – version 1.0.0
* Initial release
